results.definition: search without warning, make a sudden surprise attack on
examples: The police raided the crack house

results.definition: enter someone else's territory and take spoils
examples: The pirates raided the coastal villages regularly

results.definition: an attempt by speculators to defraud investors
search for something needed or desired
take over (a company) by buying a controlling interest of its stock
examples: T. Boone Pickens raided many large companies
